column4: hello.  i've searched google but couldn't really find anything helpful. this is pretty much a n00b question --> is it possible to add an shortcut to a web address in a normal ubuntu folder??  for example, say i wanted to add an icon on the desktop which linked to "www.ubuntu.com" ??
You could make a launcher that runs something like 'firefox www.website.com', not sure about the exact syntax though
(probably, anyway.  I haven't tried it, but it ought to work....)
thankyou. where could i find the exact syntax?
